name: romm
description: ROMM is a self-hosted ROM manager for emulators, allowing users to manage and browse ROM libraries via a responsive web UI. It supports tagging, metadata, and organizing by platform.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Fetch game titles, descriptions, and artwork from online databases

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Browse your collection through a modern, responsive web UI

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find games quickly by title, platform, or custom tags

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Add custom tags to games for personalized organization

features.title: Cover Art Display
features.description: View game box art and screenshots in grid or list layouts

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create separate accounts for family members with individual collections
